recommendations: John Pipkins
Application System Engineer at Wells Fargo
July 7, 2013, Hadil worked with John in the same group

Hadil has been the creator of light in very dark areas in the implementation of technology to support complex and high value applications of the bank.  He has created tools that greatly simplify the management of the software that comprises the banks file transmission system. His understanding of ancillary systems necessary to the success of the transmission platform, including  F5 load balancers, certificates, and protocols (sftp, ftps, ftp, etc.), is second to none.  It is a rare privilege to be able to work with him.

Assistant Vice President and Senior Systems Engineer - Tealeaf Data Capture
March 24, 2012, Robert worked with Hadil in different groups

Hadil is the perfect Senior System's Engineer in my opinion. He possesses very advanced Computer and Network engineering skills, but displays little of the arrogance and self-defeating mannerisms common with people of his advanced technical caliber. Instead, he focuses his efforts on collaboration, and on team building and development. In addition, he is tireless in his duties to keep our data transmission and file transfer services online and running smoothly. I have a strong respect for Hadil and know that any team he serves will be stronger due to his involvement.
